channel.title: Leetcode on Hawk的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Leetcode on Hawk的博客

item.title: 578.查询回答率最高的问题
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月11日 21:52:22 我的解答 /* Write your T-SQL query statement below */ select question_id as survey_log from ( select *,row_number() over (order by ratio desc) as rn from ( select question_id, sum(case when action='answer' then 1.0 else 0.0 end)/sum(case when action='show' then 1.0 else 0.0 end) as ratio from survey_log group by question_id ) t1 ) t2 where rn=1 其他解答 select question_id as survey_log from survey_log group by question_id having count(answer_id)/count(distinct q_num) = (select max(rate) from (select count(answer_id)/count(distinct q_num) as rate from survey_log group by question_id)t1 ) 笔记 直接在group by…having中判断最大的，省

item.title: 579.查询员工累计薪水
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月11日 21:52:49 我的解答 /* Write your T-SQL query statement below */ select t1.Id as id,t1.Month as month,t1.Salary from ( select Id,Month,sum(Salary) over (partition by Id order by Month ROWS 2 PRECEDING) as Salary from ( select * from Employee tt where Month <> ( select b.Month from (select Id,max(Month) as Month from Employee group by Id) b where b.Id=tt.Id ) ) ttt ) t1 order by t1.Id,t1.Month desc 其他解答 select Id,Month,sum(Salary) over(partition by Id order by Month rows between 2 preceding and 0 following) as Salary from ( select Id,Month,Salary, row_number() over(partition by Id order by Month desc) as rn from Employee ) T where rn<>1 order by Id,Month desc 笔记 判断月份时，我用

item.title: 580.统计各专业学生人数
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月13日 00:03:47 我的解答 /* Write your T-SQL query statement below */ select dept_name,(case when cnt is null then 0 else cnt end) as student_number from ( ( select dept_id,count(1) as cnt from student group by dept_id ) t1 full join department t2 on t1.dept_id = t2.dept_id ) order by student_number desc,dept_name 其他解答 Select * From( Select dept_name ,(Select Count(*) From student Where department.dept_id=student.dept_id) as student_number From department ) As Temp Order By Temp.student_number DESC,Temp.dept_name ASC

item.title: 584. 寻找用户推荐人
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月13日 00:12:25 我的解答 /* Write your T-SQL query statement below */ select name from customer where referee_id <> 2 or referee_id is null 不愧是简单级别的题目

item.title: 585.2016年的投资
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月13日 20:57:33 我的解答 # Write your MySQL query statement below select round(sum(a),2) as TIV_2016 from ( select avg(a.TIV_2016) as a from insurance a,insurance b where a.PID <> b.PID and a.TIV_2015 = b.TIV_2015 and (select count(1) from insurance c where c.LAT=a.LAT and c.LON=a.LON)=1 group by a.PID ) t 其他解答 # Write your MySQL query statement below SELECT ROUND(SUM(TIV_2016), 2) as TIV_2016 FROM( SELECT *, count(*) over(partition by TIV_2015) as cnt_1, count(*) over(partition by LAT, LON) as cnt_2 FROM insurance ) a WHERE a.cnt_1 > 1 AND a.cnt_2 < 2 用窗口函数统计cnt，逻辑更加简单，效率更高，之后应该从这个角度

item.title: 586.订单最多的客户
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月17日 21:06:29 我的解法 # Write your MySQL query statement below select customer_number from ( select customer_number,count(1) as cnt from orders group by customer_number ) tt order by cnt desc limit 1 其他解法 # Write your MySQL query statement below select t.customer_number from ( # 找出和最大订单值相等的客户值 select customer_number,count(*) as res from Orders group by customer_number) t where t.res = ( # 找出最大的订单值 select max(e.res) from ( select customer_number,count(*) as res from Orders group by customer_number) e) 同解唯一和非唯一问题，非唯一问题只需要在后面运用一

item.title: 597.好友申请I：总体通过率
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月17日 21:42:30 我的解答 /* Write your T-SQL query statement below */ select round(1.0* count(distinct concat(requester_id,accepter_id)) / (case when count(distinct concat(sender_id,send_to_id))=0 then 1 else count(distinct concat(sender_id,send_to_id)) end),2) as accept_rate from friend_request a,request_accepted b 其他解答 SELECT convert(decimal(10, 2), isnull(( SELECT COUNT(*) AS accepted_count FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT requester_id, accepter_id FROM request_accepted ) t2 ) * 1.0 / ( SELECT nullif(COUNT(*),0) AS send_count FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, send_to_id FROM friend_request ) t1 ), 0)) AS accept_rate select round( ifnull( (select count(distinct requester_id ,accepter_id) from request_accepted) / (select count(distinct sender_id ,send_to_id) from friend_request) ,0) ,2) as accept_rate ; 直接用isnull判断，省去了case when的较

item.title: 601.体育馆的人流量
item.description: 刷题时间：2020年8月19日 00:24:36 我的解答 /* Write your T-SQL query statement below */ with tmptable as ( select *,row_number() over (order by visit_date) as rn from stadium where people >= 100 ) select distinct a.id,a.visit_date,a.people from tmptable a,tmptable b where (a.id - b.id >= 2 or b.id - a.id >= 2 or (a.id - b.id=1 and a.id+1 in (select id from tmptable))) and a.id - b.id = a.rn - b.rn 困难题，很有意思，分为三种情况判断是否处于连续区间 其他解答 官方解答 select distinct t1.* from stadium t1, stadium t2, stadium t3 where t1.people >= 100 and t2.people >= 100 and t3.people >= 100
